description: Simply and quickly create the voice of a celebrity through the celebrity AI voice generator free, anyone's voice can be created.
title: Celebrity AI Voice Generator Free | Generate anyone's ai voice
introduction: With Celebrity AI Voice Generator, you can easily and quickly create anyone's voice with only a short audio clip.
features: Instant Voice Cloning: Requires only a short audio clip from the reference speaker to clone their voice.
Granular Control Over Voice Styles: Allows control over various voice styles, including emotion, accent, rhythm, pauses, and intonation.
Cross-Lingual Voice Cloning: Can perform zero-shot cross-lingual voice cloning, even for languages not included in the training set.
Replicates the Tone Color: Capable of replicating the specific tone color of the reference speaker.
targetPeople: Content creators, voiceover artists, and anyone needing to replicate voices.

faqs.question: What is required to clone a voice?
faqs.answer: Only a short audio clip from the reference speaker is required to clone their voice.

faqs.question: Can the tool replicate different voice styles?
faqs.answer: Yes, it allows control over various voice styles, including emotion, accent, rhythm, pauses, and intonation.

faqs.question: Does it support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, it can perform zero-shot cross-lingual voice cloning, even for languages not included in the training set.

faqs.question: What are the pricing options?
faqs.answer: There are subscription plans offering 100 credits per month or 300 credits per month, with features like AI voice clone, fast generation, stable output, more language support, and audio download.
